alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Page (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 10:47AM CST until December 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fremont and Page Counties. In Nebraska, Nemaha, Pawnee, and Richardson Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility reductions down below 1 mile will accompany stronger snow showers.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
